title: Green House Tea Factory continues to acquire another all-time record price
body_lines: Green House Tea Factory, achieved an all-time record price of Rs. 2,750 per kg on a PEKOE grade by beating its own record price, at the tea auction held on 26/27 April 2022.

Green House Tea Factory situated in Pasgoda Panakaduwa in the Matara District, is renowned for manufacturing high-quality, award-winning teas. This Tea Factory is owned and managed by the Proprietor Susil Haputhanthrige who is reputed in manufacturing high quality, standard ‘Ceylon Tea’ at all times.
This line of tea was successfully marketed and auctioned by Mercantile Produce Brokers Ltd. and purchased by Finlays Colombo Ltd.
